TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripOverflowButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton

summary.span: 裝載 ，以便顯示讓 溢位的項目。

span.span: Hosts a that displays items that overflow the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果數多於可以顯示在表單上的溢位項目，請使用[ToolStrip 項目集合編輯器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25)來管理這種情況。If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the [ToolStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) to manage this situation.

Protected Overrides Function CreateAccessibilityInstance () As AccessibleObject
protected: override System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleObject ^ CreateAccessibilityInstance();

summary.span: 為控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
A new for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有明確呼叫 方法，將會在參考 屬性時呼叫該方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 取得或設定屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`隨安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何覆寫方法。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋出 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 表示只釋出 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 由 和 方法呼叫，以釋出 類別之目前執行個體所使用的 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: Called by the and methods to release the managed and unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫這個方法只由公用和方法。 請勿直接呼叫這個方法。This method is called only by the public and methods; do not call this method directly. 當您實作的處置模式，參數方法應使用，如下所示：When you implement the dispose pattern, the parameter of the method should be used as follows: - 目前物件的方法應該呼叫與參數設定為`true`表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源。The method of the current object should call with the parameter set to `true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources. - 目前物件的方法應該呼叫與參數設定為`false`表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。The method of the current object should call with the parameter set to `false` to release only unmanaged resources. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

returns.span: 類型的排序配對，代表矩形的寬度與高度。

span.span: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
